div.p: . . . on deposit for me, from the wheat-crop of the third year of Hadrianus Caesar the lord, to Sarapion son of Epimachus, (for his account) at Tychinabitoou, two artabas. Year 3 of Hadrianus Caesar the lord, Mesore 19. (2nd hand) . . . secretary, brought (this) and what is written above is his. (N. Gonis)
